content: रंज् {c1c} {c4c} <ab>U.</ab> (रजति-ते, रज्यति-ते, रक्त; {%<ab>pass.</ab>%} रज्यते; {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} रिरंक्षति) {@--1@} To be dyed or coloured, to redden, become red, glow; कोपरज्यन्मुखश्रीः <ls>U. 5. 3</ls>; नेत्रे स्वयं रज्यतः <ls n="U.">5. 36</ls>; <ls>N. 3. 120</ls>; <ls n="N.">7. 60</ls>, <ls n="N.">22. 52.</ls> {@--2@} To dye, tinge, colour, paint. {@--3@} To be attached or devoted to (with <ab>loc.</ab>) देवानियं निषधराजरुचस्त्यजंती रूपादरज्यत नले न विदर्भसुभ्रूः <ls>N. 13. 38</ls>; <ls>S. D. 111.</ls> {@--4@} To be enamoured of, fall in love with, feel passion or affection for. {@--5@} To be pleased, satisfied, or delighted. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (रंजयति ते) {@--1@} To dye, tinge, colour, redden, paint; सा रंजयित्वा चरणौ कृताशीः <ls>Ku. 7. 19</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">6. 81</ls>; <ls>Ki. 1. 40</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">4. 14.</ls> {@--2@} To please, gratify, propitiate, satisfy; ज्ञानलवदुर्विदग्धं ब्रह्मापि नरं न रजयति <ls>Bh. 2. 3.</ls> (रजयति also in this sense; see <ls>Ki. 6. 25</ls>); स्फुरतु कुचकुंभयोरुपरि मणिमंजरी रंजयतु तव हृदयेशं <ls>Gīt. 10.</ls> {@--3@} To conciliate, win over, keep contented; <ls>Ms. 7. 19.</ls> {@--4@} To hunt deer (रजयति only in this sense). {@--5@} <ab>Ved.</ab> To worship.
